thread.title: Ravens TE Pitta returns to practice, but future still cloudy
thread.title_full: Ravens TE Pitta returns to practice, but future still cloudy

title: Ravens TE Pitta returns to practice, but future still cloudy
text:
Ravens TE Pitta returns to practice, but future still cloudy Ravens tight end Dennis Pitta has returned to the practice field. Post to Facebook Ravens TE Pitta returns to practice, but future still cloudy Ravens tight end Dennis Pitta has returned to the practice field.  //on.wusa9.com/1LNlVTK   Join the Conversation To   Ravens TE Pitta returns to practice, but future still cloudy Associated Press, AP 11:51 p.m. EDT October 21, 2015 Oct 11, 2015; Baltimore, MD, USA; Baltimore Ravens tight end Dennis Pitta tests his injury preparing for a future return prior to the game against the Cleveland Browns at M&T Bank Stadium. Mandatory Credit: Mitch Stringer-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Mitch Stringer, Mitch Stringer-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
OWINGS MILLS, Md. (AP) - Ravens tight end Dennis Pitta has returned to the practice field, hopeful that he can rebound from a hip injury that's kept him sidelined since last year. 
Pitta is on the physically unable to perform list. Baltimore has three weeks to decide whether to place him on the 53-man roster or season-ending injured reserve. 
After Wednesday's practice, Pitta said, "It's a start. Obviously this is an assessment period." 
Pitta had 61 catches for 669 yards in 2012 and scored a touchdown in the Super Bowl. 
But after dislocating his hip the following year in training camp, he missed the first 12 weeks of the season. 
His 2014 season ended in Week 3, when he fractured and dislocated the same hip without being touched. CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE
